metadata.name: Everlasting Dawn
metadata.description:
Discover the beauty of a Parisian sunrise with 'Everlasting Dawn', an interactive piece that captures a cold morning light surrounding the Eiffel Tower. This piece offers a one-hour dynamic loop, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the peaceful, ever-changing display of colors and light. 

Make this timeless moment live on forever with 4 viewing options ranging from a one-minute loop to a one-hour loop.  

View artwork in full screen : https://ax36jk2d6ix2zjscyvy262wlsohsrn52cs2dnp673q2yeo6fb66q.arweave.net/Bffkq0PyL6ymQsVxr2rLk48ot7oUtDa_39w1gjvFD70/

SETTINGS  
PRESS B = SWITCH BACKGROUND COLOR BETWEEN BLACK OR WHITE  
PRESS 1 = STANDARD 1HR LOOP (LINKED TO YOUR DEVICE CLOCK)  
PRESS 2 = 1 MIN LOOP 
PRESS 3 = 5 MIN LOOP  
PRESS 4 = 10 MIN LOOP

MP4 file available for the owner at request for smart display use.
